import React, {useContext} from 'react'; import LanguageContext from '../../components/LanguageContext'; import Colchis from '../../img/Colchis.png' const Project = props => { const language = useContext(LanguageContext) const {number, title, technos, description, background} = props; return (
{technos}

{title}

{language.language === "Shakespeare" ? description.en : description.fr}

Kanzu

Juked

Colza

Voxey

); } export default Project;
